Aaron D. Gonzalez

Texas-born/Brooklyn-based Python & SQL fanboy. I enjoy a lot of things in life. Solving small problems with Python is one of these things. Even better, I like solving enough small problems to claim I was able to assist in solving a big one! When I'm not furiously jotting down ideas to post on, one can find me hard at work in Manhattan's Financial District...or arguing with my mean cat in Brooklyn.
